mapper.sql: id, title, name, ad_describle, type, ad_status, image_url, url, app_version, start_time, end_time, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.select:
select
from advertisement where type = 0 and ad_status = 1 order by create_time desc limit 1;
